import Nav from "../../components/nav"; import styles from './main.module.scss'; import { useEffect, useState, MouseEvent } from "react"; const Main = () => { const [ballShift, changeBallShift] = useState(0); const listener = (e:any) => { if(pageYOffset < 120) { changeBallShift(pageYOffset) } } useEffect(() => { document.body.scrollTop < 120 ? document.addEventListener('scroll', listener) : document.removeEventListener('scroll', listener); return () => { document.body.scrollTop > 120 ? document.removeEventListener('scroll', listener) : null } }) return ( <>
